channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Our weekly recent HMO fly tip., 23rd October
item.description:
As title, bins don't get emptied from our newest HMO, as they don't know or don't care how to properly fill their bins. So we have a more or less weekly fly tip at the Broad lane end of Talbot road. This is recent addition to the long established free for all fly tip on the pavement opposite. Cannot even walk on the pavement now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Talbot Road, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sections of uneven paving in and around the car park and in front of the bungalows at Broad Oak Close, 23rd October
item.description:
Residents state they have reported before, however, they are advising some sections of paving have moved and now present a potential trip hazard - paving is mainly around the front entrances to the bungalows and the drop curb in the car park area

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broad Oak Close, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Overhanging tree outside 52 Townley Road, DA6 7HN, 23rd October
item.description:
I have a tree outside my property where the branches massively overhang my drive. This causes bird dropping and tree sap to drop onto my cars. Please could you trim this back from my driveway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Townley Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This bin has been damaged for a year, 23rd October
item.description:
The bin misses half cover and this encourages improper dropping of rubbish. I appreciate the bin signals where to leave rubbish on the high street for collection. It doesnâ€™t look good for Stoke Newington High Street. This is just outside the shops numbered 30 and 32, close to a phone booth

item.title: More dumped wooden furniture!, 23rd October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Murrain Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Dangerous hole in pavement by busy pedestrian crossing, 23rd October
item.description:
This hole has been here for 2 or 3 weeks. It's a dangerous hazard on a busy pedestrian crossing used by people to reach the tube, the secondary school and Lidl. Needs fixing urgently before someone twists/breaks their ankle or trips and falls into the Main Road. Its quite deep now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Stockwell Terrace, Stockwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
